<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the old merged/optimized IndexOperandHashMap is compatible with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the current IndexOperandHashMap. An operand hash may not be stable across</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// different builds due to varying modules combined. To address this, we relax</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the hash check condition by comparing Const hash patterns instead of absolute</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// hash values. For example, let&#39;s assume we have three Consts located at idx1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// idx3, and idx6, where their corresponding hashes are hash1, hash2, and hash1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the old merged map below:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Old (Merged): &#91;(idx1, hash1), (idx3, hash2), (idx6, hash1)&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Current: &#91;(idx1, hash1&#39;), (idx3, hash2&#39;), (idx6, hash1&#39;)&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the current function also has three Consts in the same locations,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with hash sequences hash1&#39;, hash2&#39;, and hash1&#39; where the first and third</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are the same as the old hash sequences, we consider them matched.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337" lineLink="#a507bf9056bce6ed68f4c1c14323e03a2"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a507bf9056bce6ed68f4c1c14323e03a2">checkConstHashCompatible</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;IndexPair, stable&#95;hash&gt;</a> &amp;OldInstOpndIndexToConstHash,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;IndexPair, stable&#95;hash&gt;</a> &amp;CurrInstOpndIndexToConstHash) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;stable&#95;hash, stable&#95;hash&gt;</a> OldHashToCurrHash;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;Index, OldHash&#93; : OldInstOpndIndexToConstHash) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> It = CurrInstOpndIndexToConstHash.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0c047f127ed4380a6f383d70bec4eb94">find</a>(Index);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (It == CurrInstOpndIndexToConstHash.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a65520b9c67759099e313d0f4e7b5ff9e">end</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CurrHash = It-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> J = OldHashToCurrHash.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0c047f127ed4380a6f383d70bec4eb94">find</a>(OldHash);</span></CodeLine>
